snippet: The French defense minister, Jean-Yves Le Drian, said that French forces in Mali had found tons of weapons stockpiled by fighters linked to Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb.
abstract: French Defense Min Jean-Yves Le Drian says at end of two-day visit to Mali that French forces have discovered tons of weapons stockpiled by fighters linked to Al Qaeda in Islamic Maghreb, and that they had planned to use country's north as base for international attacks.
lead_paragraph: The French defense minister, Jean-Yves Le Drian, said that French forces in Mali had found tons of weapons stockpiled by fighters linked to Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb.

headline.main: Mali: French Official Says Weapons Stockpiled by Militants Are Found
headline.print_headline: Mali: French Official Says Weapons Stockpiled by Militants Are Found

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb
keywords.name: organizations
